TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TupleExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class TupleExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供元组用于与 C# 中的元组的语言支持进行互操作的扩展方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods for tuples to interoperate with language support for tuples in C#.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然可以直接调用这些方法，它们是主要用于创建和解构元组中的 C# 编译器。Although these methods can be called directly, they are primarily intended for use by the C# compiler in creating and deconstructing tuples.

summary.span: 将元组中的各组件解构为单独的变量。

span.span: Deconstructs the components of a tuple into separate variables.
